name: La rosa de Azrael
description:
This game was made in 2019

This the first game I've ever made. It's a puzzle game where the player needs to swaap between dimensions to find a key in every level to advance to the next one. The main objective is to find "La Rosa de Azrael", an artifact capable to grant wishes, in order to save the world. 

This is a NDS game, so you'll need an emulator to play it. I recommend WINDSPRO12
